chapter.title: Changes & Deprecated Functionality
chapter.para: This chapter covers both major changes to existing functionality, and also deprecated and removed functionality.

listitem.para: The configuration file location has changed.

As SAML 2.0 federation support is now integrated into the main ${projectName} .war file, the way of configuring dispatch to the Federation component has changed. For an example of how the configuration is handled now, see the Guide to ${projectName} chapter, Tutorial For ${projectName} Federation, or read the example configuration file, Configuration for the Federation Tutorial.
If you are running older versions of ${projectName} you must modify your config.json.

section.title: Removed Functionality
section.para: Custom Servlet and Servlet Filter integration now requires additional development. For an example, see the org.forgerock.openig.handler.saml package.
